LV_Add().description: Adds a new row to the bottom of the list.

LV_Delete().description: Deletes the specified row or all rows.

LV_DeleteCol().description: Deletes the specified column and all of the contents beneath it.

LV_GetCount().description: Returns the total number of rows or columns, or the number of selected rows only.

LV_GetNext().description: Returns the row number of the next selected, checked, or focused row.

LV_GetText().description: Retrieves the text at the specified RowNumber and ColumnNumber and stores it in OutputVar.

LV_Insert().description: Inserts a new row before the specified row.

LV_InsertCol().description: Inserts a new column before the specified column.

LV_Modify().description: Modifies the attributes and/or text of a row.

LV_ModifyCol().description: Modifies the attributes and/or text of the specified column and its header.

LV_SetImageList().description: Sets or replaces the ListView's ImageList.
